title: Seattle City Council 2/16/2021
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28.15, until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.

Agenda: Call to Order, Roll Call, Presentations, Approval of the Journal, Adoption of the Introduction and Referral Calendar, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Payment of Bills; CF 314469: 2021 State of the City Address delivered by Mayor Jenny A. Durkan on February 16, 2021; Res 31989: affirming support for progressive big business taxes; CB 119996: relating to Seattle's construction codes - Seattle Fire Code; Res 31990: setting the time and place for hearings; Res 31992: identifying the principles and activities characterizing equitable distribution of COVID-19 vaccines.
Advance to a specific part
Presentations - 1:08
Public Comment - 3:32
Payment of Bills - 39:01
CF 314469: Acceptance of 2021 State of the City Address delivered by Mayor Jenny A. Durkan - 40:13
Res 31989: affirming support for progressive big business taxes - 42:04
CB 119996: relating to Seattle's construction codes - Seattle Fire Code - 43:29
Res 31990: setting the time and place for hearings - 48:01
Res 31992: relating to equitable distribution of COVID-19 vaccines - 50:34
